::: callout-important
Please complete all today's lab tasks before leaving lab today.
:::

-   Reserve [STA 210 RStudio Container](https://cmgr.oit.duke.edu/containers)

    -   Make sure to reserve the container titled "STA210" [**not**]{.underline} "RStudio"

    -   Start the container and confirm you see the RStudio interface

-   [Submit](https://forms.office.com/r/S1eSDTjB6M) your GitHub username and confirm you have access to the RStudio container

    -   If you do not have a GitHub username, [click here](https://happygitwithr.com/github-acct.html) for information on registering for a GitHub account and choosing a username

-   Complete the [STA 210 Student Survey](https://forms.office.com/r/fySdtq2mNT)
